mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reward_order (order_id, biz_id, user_id, activity_id, behavior_type, reward_type, reward_value, reward_state, reward_desc, reward_time) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{bizId}, #{userId}, #{activityId}, #{behaviorType}, #{rewardType}, #{rewardValue}, #{rewardState}, #{rewardDesc}, #{rewardTime})
mapper.select: SELECT order_id, biz_id, user_id, activity_id, behavior_type, reward_type, reward_value, reward_state, reward_desc, reward_time FROM reward_order WHERE behavior_type = 'SIGN' AND user_id = #{userId} AND activity_id = #{activityId} AND reward_time >= CURDATE() AND reward_time < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) LIMIT 1
